response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it stands out in its category. We believe its value exceeds $12,000, reflecting its superior performance, durability, and unique features. Given its scarcity and exclusivity, we're offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire it directly from us at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a special offer tailored to discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate the finer things. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this extraordinary acquisition.", "product_price": 15000}
